description:
We are changing the world and love what we do so if you want to work at a fast paced, exciting environment please apply. Voyager seeks an energetic, creative, and detail-oriented individual with excellent communication skills to help architect measurable and integrated partnerships. This role requires an ability to successfully operate in a fast-paced ever-evolving environment. You will be responsible for overseeing the activation and measurement of partnerships across verticals (Sports & Entertainment, Music, and Trade). Voyager partnerships prioritize crypto education, as such, this role will be the primary driver of ensuring we establish and advance our education through partnerships.
Responsibilities:
Create and manage the marketing and communications, and other promotional activities, for all events and partnerships Plan events from start to finish, according to requirements, target audience, and objectives Establish the proper measurement (scorecard) and define success for our partnerships Leverage teams across functions to ensure that partnerships are aligned to our global brand strategy, integrated and come to life across paid, owned and earned channels, inclusive of activations and hospitality Bring partnerships to life through healthy and productive relationships Research and evaluate venues and facilities; make recommendations on site selection Step back and look at the big picture to ensure we enhance every event aligning to business goals and positive/memorable customer experiences Provide high-touch customer service to all clients; work directly with registrants on problems and inquiries Prepare budgets and ensure adherence Source and negotiate with vendors and suppliers, finalize contracts, and ensure vendors payments are processed accordingly Oversee event activations to ensure smooth operation from beginning to end Analyze the event's success and prepare reports
Qualifications:
10
years experience in integrated sponsorship and sports marketing Experience managing and developing a team Proven experience as event manager Creative thinker that can align creativity with business objects Ability to leverage partners to support activation and awesome consumer experiences Skilled in project management Knowledge of KPIs and marketing techniques for event management Outstanding communication and negotiation ability Excellent organizational skills with a knack for problem-solving Customer-service orientation Experience briefing and working with media and creative agencies Excellent people and communication skills to liaise with internal teams, external partners and stakeholders of various levels Ability to multitask and prioritise work in an unstructured environment across various markets and timezones. Experience working with professional sports teams a requirement Experience working in countries other than the USA preferred What we offer Competitive Salary Employee Benefits including healthcare (medical, dental, vision) and 401k Stock Options Unlimited PTO Voyager is headquartered in New York City with satellite offices in New Jersey, California, Toronto and Bordeaux.
